name: Heekki
description: Heekki is a rapidly developed game narrating the journey of a small beaver looking to relocate his family. For University, our prompt for this was 'Gift a Game' and around Christmas time, I decided I wanted to do this for my partner. There is huge emphasis on keeping busy while apart so you can enjoy 'home' together, albeit short - this is the first game I have ever completed fully and has a working crafting system. I hope you enjoy the journey to building Heekki as much as I did, have a great day!
